definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: Spanish unemployment soared, and the budget went into deep deficit.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙失業率飛速上升，預算陷入深深的赤字之中。

sentences.english: Under the budget proposal, hedge-fund managers would be taxed at higher rates.
sentences.chinese: 根據預算方案，對沖基金經理將按更高的稅率繳稅。

sentences.english: The judge played bridge in the lodge with the budgeter last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚法官和預算員在門房裏打過橋牌。

sentences.english: You should constantly monitor the cost of development and check for cost overrun.
sentences.chinese: 應該不斷地監視開發的成本以防成本超出預算。

sentences.english: The budget will depend on the script, what kind of financing the producer can get, and also who is cast in the movie.
sentences.chinese: 預算取決於劇本，獲得的投資以及影片的演員陣容。

sentences.english: Budgeting is something that people either love or hate to do.
sentences.chinese: 編制預算對很多人來說是又愛又恨的事情。

sentences.english: And each and every practice describes how it supports budgeting.
sentences.chinese: 而每個實踐都描述了它如何支持預算。

sentences.english: We budgeted for a new computer.
sentences.chinese: 我們預算購買一臺新電腦。

sentences.english: Alert Bay is also the first marina we have stopped at that is truly affordable on our budget.
sentences.chinese: 阿樂灣也是我們停留的碼頭中最符合我們預算的。

sentences.english: At least hold accountant certificate specialize in accounting or budget.
sentences.chinese: 擁有會計師或預算師資格。

sentences.english: The second chapter narrated the comprehensive budget management elementary theory.
sentences.chinese: 第二章講述了全面預算管理的基本理論。

sentences.english: First, the government should allocate resources for promoting economic development.
sentences.chinese: 首先，預算案須撥出資源推動經濟發展。

sentences.english: You may be accountable to complete projects to deadline and under budget.
sentences.chinese: 你可能要負責在期限之內以既定的預算完成各項任務。

sentences.english: I' try not to exceed my planned budget for this holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我試著不要計畫我的旅行會超出預算。

sentences.english: The committee chose two members besides me for the budget problem.
sentences.chinese: 爲了預算問題，委員會除我之外，另選兩位委員。

sentences.english: Based on "Highway Construction and over budget" in the relevant knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 依據《公路工程施工組織及概預算》中的相關知識，。

definition: expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
